postArray.title: How to to a Hello World program!
postArray.text: The classic Hello World program is quite simple, even for beginners, simply write console.log(Hello World) with Hello World surrounded by quotes.
postArray.author: Ian Backus
postArray.label: TUTORIAL

postArray.title: Variable Question
postArray.text: How do I declare a variable in javascript?
postArray.label: QUESTION
postArray.author: Ethan Hardey

replies.replyText: A compiler translates the source code in a program into machine code so the computer can understand it.

postArray.title: How to write a for loop in Javascript!
postArray.text: For loops in javascript are quite easy, we can write one by typing as follows: for(let i = 0; i < 6; i++){} Inside of those curly brackets you would put the code that would execute inside the loop.
postArray.label: TUTORIAL
postArray.author: Ethan Hardey

postArray.title: I think Pascal is the best language
postArray.text: It's obvious really, Pascal combines readability with the teaching of good habits, making it the best language ever created both for veterans and beginner programmers.
postArray.label: DISCUSSION
postArray.author: Ian Backus
